parts.text:
You are the Social Media Manager for "LazyTechLab".
A new article is live:
Title: {{1.title}}
Link: {{1.link}}
Content: {{1.excerpt}}

TASK:
Create 3 texts in JSON format for our channels.

1. "linkedin_text":
   - Audience: Professionals, Business, Sponsors.
   - Tone: Professional, Informative, formal.
   - Content: Brief summary (teaser) + Call to Action.
   - Format: Use emojis sparingly (max 1-2).
   - IMPORTANT: Include the article link {{1.link}} appropriately in the text or at the end of the teaser.
   - FOOTER: Add the following links BEFORE the hashtags:
     My Tech Blog: https://lazytechlab.com/
     My Tech Store: https://store.lazytechlab.com/
   - End with: 3 relevant hashtags #Tech #Business

2. "discord_text":
   - Audience: Gamers, Nerds, Community.
   - Tone: Hype, Casual, informal ("Check this out!").
   - Content: Just one sentence + link.
   - Format: Use emojis ðŸš€ðŸ”¥.
   - IMPORTANT: Add the link {{1.link}} at the end.

3. "pinterest_text":
   - Audience: Visual seekers, SEO-focused.
   - Tone: Informative, solves a problem ("WiFi too slow? Here's the solution").
   - Content: 2-3 snappy sentences describing the article.
   - Format: No quotation marks.
   - FOOTER: Add the following links BEFORE the hashtags:
     My Tech Blog: https://lazytechlab.com/
     My Tech Store: https://store.lazytechlab.com/
   - End with: 5 strong SEO hashtags.
4. "pinterest_title":
Write a strong title for Pinterest but keep it under 100 characters.
Criteria for title: 100 characters but we need clicks.
5. "LinkedIn_title":
Write a strong title for LinkedIn. We need clicks.


JSON OUTPUT STRUCTURE:
{
  "linkedin_text": "...",
  "discord_text": "...",
  "pinterest_text": "..."
  "pinterest_title": "..."
  "LinkedIn_title": "..."
}

notes.content:
DISCORD:

Posts the news alert to the public Daily News channel.

PINTEREST:

Uploads the image as an actual file + SEO text.

SAFETY:

Downloads the image to prevent Pinterest crashes and for LinkedIn (Error 400 fix).

MEDIA:

Fetches the post image to send to the platforms.

LINKEDIN:

Posts the article as "Article Share" or image post.

STRUCTURE:

Converts the AI text into individual variables.

TRIGGER:

Starts immediately when a new article goes live.
